00030 QString ComboSelector::exec() {
00031 
00032         // if user clicked cancel
00033         if (!QInputDialog::exec()) {
00034                 return QString();
00035         }
00036         // otherwise return the string that was selected
00037         return textValue();
00038 }

00040 QString ComboSelector::selectGroupType(QWidget* parent /* = 0*/,
00041                                                                            const QString selected /*= QString()*/,
00042 const QString label /* = tr("Select group type or create your own group type")*/) {
00043 
00044         // create the selector instance
00045         ComboSelector selector(parent, selected);
00046 
00047         // set options for the selector box
00048         selector.setCancelButtonText(tr("Cancel"));
00049         selector.setComboBoxEditable(true);
00050         selector.setInputMode(QInputDialog::TextInput);
00051         selector.setLabelText(label);
00052         selector.setOkButtonText(tr("Ok"));
00053 
00054         // add the items to the box
00055         QStringList comboItems;
00056         comboItems.append(tr("diagnostics"));
00057         comboItems.append(tr("documentation"));
00058         comboItems.append(tr("projectFiles"));
00059         comboItems.append(tr("simulation"));
00060         comboItems.append(tr("sourceFiles"));
00061         selector.setComboBoxItems(comboItems);
00062 
00063         selector.setTextValue(selected);
00064 
00065         return selector.exec();
00066 }
